TEXT.TITLE: APPLIED SOLAR ENERGY CORP <SOLR.O> 2ND QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:

    Revs 7,652,000 vs 4,279,000
    Six mths

dlrs, or four cts per shr, in six mths.
